author: sky.cactus
content: It was never actually introduced as an EIP.

author: sky.cactus
content: It was just a proposal for an EIP.  Didn't even make it to draft.

author: sky.cactus
content: This is an incredibly common thing, usually it means the idea has no champion.

author: sky.cactus
content: For example, I have an idea for an EIP from a couple years ago that I still think is a good idea and has received generally positive feedback, but I he never gotten around to pushing it through so it still sits as an issue with no formal EIP.
